parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
资源目录成员账号主账号ID。
>调用[DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~)接口可以获取该参数。

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description: The UUIDs of the ECS instances. Separate multiple UUIDs with commas (,).
